events.description: Marcus Semien reaches on a throwing error by third baseman Hunter Dozier.
Travis Jankowski singles on a bunt ground ball to third baseman Hunter Dozier. Marcus Semien to 2nd.
Nathaniel Lowe pops out to shortstop Nicky Lopez on the infield fly rule. 1 out
Josh Jung homers (3) on a fly ball to left center field. Marcus Semien scores. Travis Jankowski scores.
Jonah Heim walks.
